attributes.action: Legalise cannabis and expunge previous convictions for possession
attributes.additional_details:
We believe people are using cannabis anyway and that it needs regulation and commercialisation. We believe it would offer a significant boost to the economy and labour market, whilst simultaneously diverting black market finances back into the economy.
 
A person's mind and experiences are their own and should not be subject to government control or limitation via prohibition.
attributes.background: Legalise cannabis for recreational use by adults (18+) and reverse legal prosecutions for anyone previously convicted of possession for personal use and not enterprise.
